p: The results showed that coating treatments formulated with LO recorded the widest ZI against tested microorganisms ( B. cinerea and Penicillium spp.), in particular, treatments with double the MIC (CH 2MIC and AG 2MIC). Lemongrass oil incorporated in AG and CH produced antimicrobial coatings which exhibited antifungal properties, as reported in previous studies [ 84, 85, 86]. Alginate and chitosan-based coatings formulated with LO have been used to maintain microbial quality for pomegranate [ 57], fresh-cut pineapple [ 85], fresh-cut apples [ 84], and others.
